message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500. I think it's a fair deal considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. I think it's a good compromise considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This would still be a significant saving for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $10,750 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in between $11,000 and $10,500?
